features: Chafing limitation: One piece of seamless material between the legs keeps chafing to minimum, while maximizing comfort
Active comfort: The soft, fluid materials follow your movements and the adjustable waistband ensures the short sits comfortably on your hips, while the mesh sides optimise breathability
Moisture management: The quick-drying fabric expels sweat and rain water to keep you feeling comfortable and minimize chafing, so you can focus on the trail ahead
AdvancedSkin ActiveDry: AdvancedSkin technical fabrics improve body comfort by keeping you dry, warm and protected when you need it and where you need it
Inner tight: A longer, integrated tight to avoid chafing and offer support

Twinskin™: Twinskin™ is a unique Salomon construction, binding a stretch inner tight fabric inside the thighs with a looser outer short, to reduce chafing in a key zone. Looks like a short, fits like a tight
